sub_title: ERP Implementation Manager at SBM Offshore
summary:
A competent Manager & Marine Engineer with more than 27 years of working experience.  A seagoing Marine Engineer up to level of Marine Chief Engineer for the first 13 years mostly on Chemical / Petroleum Tankers with short stints on Container vessel, Passenger Carriers & Dredgers.
			
For the next 13 plus years; involved in PreFEED, FEED & EPC scope of work in Oil & Gas Industry. The focus has been on engineering project management, marine system design, package management & department management on offshore facility engineering & procurement works mainly on FPSOâ€™s & TLP.

For the last one year, involved in ERP(IFS) implementation at SBM Offshore in capacity as Business Process Owner and Functional Implementation Manager for Engineering Division.
